thread.section_title: The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Total dump. Avoid at all cost.
thread.title_full: Total dump. Avoid at all cost. - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gary M
title: Total dump. Avoid at all cost.
text:
Sockets and light switches broken in room. Radiator hanging off the wall. Telephone in room doesn't work. Cracks in bath. Wallpaper stained and coming off the wall. Bath taps dripping.
Doesn't look like a cleaner has entered the room.
Only one lamp in the room worked
Generally needs a refurbishment. When I complained we were offered another room, we went to inspect it but it was worse than the current room.
Apparently only floors 1 to 5 have been refurbished, if you are offered any other floor i would strongly suggest you refuse.
See all photos
